/api/mo/uni/infra/vlanns-[kube-pool]-static.json
{
    "fvnsVlanInstP": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "kube-pool",
            "allocMode": "static",
            "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "fvnsEncapBlk": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "allocMode": "static",
                        "from": "vlan-4001",
                        "to": "vlan-4001",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    }
                }
            },
            {
                "fvnsEncapBlk": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "allocMode": "static",
                        "from": "vlan-4003",
                        "to": "vlan-4003",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    }
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}

/api/mo/uni/vmmp-Kubernetes/dom-kubernetes1.json

    "vmmDomP": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "kubernetes1",
            "mode": "k8s",
            "enfPref": "sw",
            "encapMode": "vxlan",
            "prefEncapMode": "vxlan",
            "mcastAddr": "225.1.2.3",
            "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "vmmCtrlrP": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "kubernetes1",
                        "mode": "k8s",
                        "scope": "kubernetes",
                        "hostOrIp": "1.1.1.1",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    }
                }
            },

                "vmmRsDomMcastAddrNs": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "tDn": "uni/infra/maddrns-kube-mpool",

/api/mo/uni/infra.json

    "infraAttEntityP": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "kube-aep",
            "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "infraRsDomP": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "tDn": "uni/vmmp-Kubernetes/dom-kubernetes1",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    }
                }
            },
            {
                "infraRsDomP": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "tDn": "uni/phys-kubernetes-control",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    }
                }
            },

                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "provacc",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    },
                    "children": [
                        {

                                "attributes": {

                                    "mode": "regular",

                                    "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                                }
                            }
                        },
                        {
                            "dhcpInfraProvP": {
                                "attributes": {
                                    "mode": "controller",
                                    "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            },
            {
                "infraGeneric": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "default",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    },
                    "children": [

        "attributes": {
            "opflexpAuthenticateClients": "no",
            "opflexpUseSsl": "no",
            "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
        }

/api/node/mo/comp/prov-Kubernetes/ctrlr-[kubernetes1]-kubernetes1/injcont/info.json
{
    "vmmInjectedClusterInfo": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "kubernetes1",
            "accountName": "demo",
            "type": "",
            "provider": ""
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "vmmInjectedClusterDetails": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "accProvisionInput": "aci_config:\n  system_id: kube\n  use_legacy_kube_naming_convention: True\n  cluster_tenant: demo\n  apic_hosts:\n    - 10.30.120.100\n  apic_login:\n    username: admin\n    \n  apic_version: 5.0\n  aep: kube-aep\n  vrf:\n    name: kubernetes-vrf\n    tenant: common\n  l3out:\n    name: l3out\n    external_networks:\n    - l3out\n  physical_domain:\n    domain: kubernetes-control\n  sync_login:\n    certfile: user.crt\n    keyfile: user.key\n  vmm_domain:\n    domain: kubernetes1\n    controller: kubernetes1\n    encap_type: vxlan\n    mcast_range:\n        start: 225.2.1.1\n        end: 225.2.255.255\n  client_ssl: false\n\nnet_config:\n  node_subnet: 10.1.0.1/16\n  pod_subnet: 10.2.0.1/16\n  pod_subnet_chunk_size: 24\n  extern_dynamic: 10.4.0.1/16\n  extern_static: 10.3.0.1/24\n  node_svc_subnet: 10.6.0.1/24\n  kubeapi_vlan: 4001\n  service_vlan: 4003\n  infra_vlan: 4093\n  disable_wait_for_network: true\n\nkube_config:\n  use_external_service_ip_allocator: true\n  use_privileged_containers: true\n  use_openshift_security_context_constraints: true\n  allow_kube_api_default_epg: true\n  snat_operator:\n      disable_periodic_snat_global_info_sync: true\n  image_pull_policy: IfNotPresent\n  \nregistry:\n  image_prefix: noiro\n\nlogging:\n  controller_log_level: debug\n  hostagent_log_level: debug\n  opflexagent_log_level: info\n",

/api/mo/uni/tn-common.json
{
    "fvTenant": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "common",
            "dn": "uni/tn-common"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "vzFilter": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "kube-allow-all-filter",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    },
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "vzEntry": {
                                "attributes": {
                                    "name": "allow-all",
                                    "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            },
            {
                "vzBrCP": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "kube-l3out-allow-all",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    },
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "vzSubj": {
                                "attributes": {
                                    "name": "allow-all-subj",
                                    "consMatchT": "AtleastOne",
                                    "provMatchT": "AtleastOne",
                                    "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                                },
                                "children": [
                                    {
                                        "vzRsSubjFiltAtt": {
                                            "attributes": {
                                                "tnVzFilterName": "kube-allow-all-filter",
                                                "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                                            }
                                        }
                                    }
                                ]
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}

{
    "fvTenant": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "demo",
            "dn": "uni/tn-demo",
            "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "fvAp": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "kubernetes",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"

                    "children": [

/api/mo/uni/tn-common/out-l3out/instP-l3out.json
{
    "fvRsProv": {
        "attributes": {
            "matchT": "AtleastOne",
            "tnVzBrCPName": "kube-l3out-allow-all",
            "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
        }
    }
}
/api/mo/uni/tn-common/out-l3out/instP-l3out/rsprov-kube-l3out-allow-all.json
None
/api/node/mo/uni/userext/user-kube.json
{
    "aaaUser": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "kube",
            "accountStatus": "active",
            "pwd": "NotRandom!",
            "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "aaaUserDomain": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "all",
                        "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                    },
                    "children": [
                        {
                            "aaaUserRole": {
                                "attributes": {
                                    "name": "admin",
                                    "privType": "writePriv",
                                    "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}
/api/node/mo/uni/userext/user-kube.json
{
    "aaaUser": {
        "attributes": {
            "name": "kube",
            "annotation": "orchestrator:aci-containers-controller"
        },
        "children": [
            {
                "aaaUserCert": {
                    "attributes": {
                        "name": "kube.crt",
                        "data": "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\nMIIB4jCCAUsCAgPoMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBBQUAMDkxCzAJBgNVBAYTAlVTMRYwFAYD\nVQQKDA1DaXNjbyBTeXN0ZW1zMRIwEAYDVQQDDAlVc2VyIGt1YmUwHhcNMjEwNzEy\nMTU1MTUwWhcNMzEwNzExMDM1MTUwWjA5MQswCQYDVQQGEwJVUzEWMBQGA1UECgwN\nQ2lzY28gU3lzdGVtczESMBAGA1UEAwwJVXNlciBrdWJlMIGfMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEB\nAQUAA4GNADCBiQKBgQCqEeWQNf9SzDRylOmLEvsPNQ76emBFVki+tux1OexYopBs\nUeh3KLXqPjtPDsbOihfRKFB62fX/RtsGM4UvT/RhTvmOQUufwgo27QIYbkPRLNG6\nE/YBwnSCt9Np9FinTdk/e3PoB4SrUTOET2qf8zg23xPWYNl2SVqRoODFeKdsMwID\nAQABMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBBQUAA4GBAIvX5KKC3qdpksOYZnam1peKnBsBGxnaXOpo\nJdMVtPm1MrgXPEuMkzoRDYHbJ1B2KRkxInN8JrCYvoz+gjtEH/xpAGPgUSunhWpP\noIvFnJW7sJLut06a77FCql0HSXNkEF3CQNrv1+o/QfGecklfKqZ2TLwD/13Xr42o\nzLgI9bIz\n-----END CERTIFICATE-----\n",
